website_summaries.verdict: The Merrell All Out Crush Light is a lightweight trail running shoe designed with durable traction. With its moderate level of cushioning, this shoe is only ideal for light trail. It does not provide the right protection for technical terrains and long distance runs.
pros: Many runners liked the lightweight built of the All Out Crush Light
It is a reasonably priced shoe
Some testers took note that this shoe is very comfortable
Delivers reliable traction while running on trail, based on some comments
cons: The sole of the All Out Crush Light wears out quickly as mentioned in some reviews
Some noticed that cushioning is not a priority in this shoe

customer_reviews.title: Okay, not great
customer_reviews.text: Far too small - I wear a 10.5 and ended up getting these in a 12... Grips are good off-road, but are an absolute liability if you happen to come across any damp concrete flag stones - I ended up on my backside the first time I wore these out. Never had such a slippery pair of shoes. Internal cushioning is limited.
customer_reviews.author: C. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe for soft woodland trails....
customer_reviews.text: This Merrell (All Out Crush Light) shoe is absolutely great. I ran my first woodland trail marathon in them last weekend. I believe they made quite some difference. They are like a cross-over between road running shoes and true trail shoes, which makes them comfy, very light weight and with excellent grip on wet woodland trails & tarmac walks. Which makes them in my eyes the perfect shoes for soft natural trail runs. But be careful if you want to run longer distances on a road with them as well, they are quite slippery on wet autumn days if you run on concrete road surfaces or manhole covers. All in all I am more than happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: I loved these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes. They are so light and comfortable. However, they got holes in them after about a month and this got gradually worse. All in all they lasted about 3 months. The seller did not respond to my email so if I were you I would buy them from a shop so you can take back!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. D. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs and fit superbly
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant trainers, more so for the vastly reduced price! I'm not a runner, but I like to do a lot of walking and also train a lot at the gym and these are ideal for all those situations I'm not a Nike or Adidas fan at all, poorly made trainers with daft prices, simply in the name of fashion etc. So these Merrells are exactly what's needed Would have gone for a set of Inov8 trainers again, but they're still quite high priced!
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: Wears incredibly fast and offers very little cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two pairs, one for myself and one for my brother. Both have had the soles wear down to smooth in places in less than 200km. They're very comfortable to have on and might be the most breathable runners I've ever had, but the trade off is both hard surfaces (tarmac/concrete) and rough surfaces (stone shingle) are incredibly uncomfortable to run on. Would not recommend, though I will try other, heavier merrell's.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after less then five months
customer_reviews.text: Really liked these at first. Unfortunately, they are now falling apart. I've had them less than 5 months, and haven't worn them that much (30-45 min run, three times a week). The upper material appears to be disintegrating. Soon to be in the bin :(
customer_reviews.author: PAUL REID

customer_reviews.title: Great Merrells!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Light with mesh sides so dry quickly and easily. All most sticky grip soles which are great when walking on wet rocks. Last Merrells lasted over 10 years so I hope these do to! Fit as expected. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for trail running
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfortable shoe. The reason for the three stars is due to it being a trail shoe there is very minimal protection and cushioning. Hard on the knees and you feel any rough terrain you run over. Wouldn’t recommend as a trail running shoe
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: trainers off road
customer_reviews.text: Have just worn on one occasion around the house to date and found them to be a very good fit and comfortable and warm to wear on a cold night. Looking forward to spring weather before trying them for any running and if I like them would post a further comment, then. Like the look too.
customer_reviews.author: John Whites

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight shoe. Just be warned, if you're planning on wearing them on tarmac, the soles wear down very rapidly. I'm guessing that they are designed for off-road. Otherwise brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Hill Lad

customer_reviews.title: Merrell trainers
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I run miles over the downs and they're just perfect. I've just ordered a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: sally norris

customer_reviews.title: Well fitting and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Good comfortable shoes, although they feel a bit rough inside along a couple of the seams. Very light in weight yet sturdy build. Glad I got them at sale price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Simkins

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and improved my 5km timing by 4 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Very light, comfortable and improved my 5km timing by 4 minutes! Not waterproof though...
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Fave trainers
customer_reviews.text: Really, really, really, really comfortable with a good sole and some toe front protection. Perfect for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Great for off road running
customer_reviews.text: Great for off road running. I'm normally a 9 / 9.5 and ordered these in a 10 which fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Sugref

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase...value for money.Very comfortable and well designed to a high spec.
customer_reviews.author: michael george donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Slippery when wet
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, incredibly comfy. Just the right amount of cushion for a light weight running shoe. Only downside is the grips are incredibly slippery especially when running in the wet.
customer_reviews.author: MTV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ah now this is a very good general purpose outdoor activity shoe
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL S.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortably, but ...
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable and functional shoe for easy hiking and trial runs, but after only 140 km of activity, the bottom of the shoe began to separate. On both shoes :-(
customer_reviews.author: Boris Vukovic

customer_reviews.title: My No1 choice of trainers
customer_reviews.text: No problems with Merrell, I only buy their trainers now good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One to miss
customer_reviews.text: Not up to normal Merrell standard - wasn't really impressed so returned.
customer_reviews.author: Edward S.

customer_reviews.title: great shoes, I highly recommend them for trail races
customer_reviews.text: Raced in them yesterday,great shoes,I highly recommend them for trail races.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for tough mudder and OCR
customer_reviews.text: Bought for tough mudder. Great shoe for the job, amazing grip through the mud and up the obstacles on a very wet and muddy course. Great deal on prime day, well worth the money (c£32).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good trail show
customer_reviews.text: Light , fitted well and did well with muddy conditions, nice grip on them. Only bad bit is not much in the way of cushioning for stoney ground
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Although I get my usual shoe size UK 8 but ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I get my usual shoe size UK 8 but a bit small at the bottom compared to my other shoes
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Great value and lighter than others
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with these so far. Feel very light compared to other trail shoes, but still strong grip in muddy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: T. George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A light comfortable running shoe-great for running on short grass-look good too
customer_reviews.author: garry weston

customer_reviews.title: don't go 1/2 size bigger
customer_reviews.text: I was told to get 1/2 size bigger. I wish I hadn't but a great show none the less
customer_reviews.author: David Naylor

customer_reviews.title: they fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband’s birthday. Knew there would be no problem re sizing as Merrill 11 fit him perfectly. He loves the shoes, they fit like a glove, are so very light and as comfortable as carpet slippers, granted they are not waterproof, but they were bought to wear in Tenerife. An absolute bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but watch the size!
customer_reviews.text: Looked good but too small to fit my foot inside! I already ordered a size bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Nicholas  K

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's All Out Crush Light Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: These All Out Crush Light shoes from Merrell feature breathable mesh, TPU and woven fabric upper. These shoes also feature traditional lace closure along with protective toe cap and reflective details for increased visibility in low light.
feature_bullets: Mesh, TPU and Woven Fabric Upper - Offers a breathable environment.
Traditional Lace Closure - Ensures a secure fit.
Reflective Detailing - Provides visibility in low light conditions.
Integrated EVA Footbed - Provides cushioning and rebound properties.
UniFly Midsole - Disperses impact and stabilizes for a solid takeoff.
